meanings.definition: Utter a high-pitched piercing sound or words in such a sound.
meanings.sent1: The little girl shrieks with joy when she sees her birthday cake.
meanings.sent2: The cat often shrieks loudly when it wants to go outside.
meanings.sent3: The bird shrieks happily as it flies through the sky.
meanings.sent4: The wind shrieks through the trees on stormy nights.
meanings.sent5: The kettle shrieks when the water inside boils.

meanings.definition: A high-pitched piercing sound or words uttered in such a sound.
meanings.sent1: The haunted house was filled with eerie shrieks in the night.
meanings.sent2: The shrieks of excitement from the crowd could be heard across the stadium.
meanings.sent3: The movie was so funny that it caused shrieks of laughter from the audience.
meanings.sent4: The shrieks of the sirens warned of danger approaching.
meanings.sent5: The shrieks of the seagulls echoed along the shore.
